content.question:
The x axis ranges from 0 to 11 in increments of 1.

The y axis ranges from 0 to 7 in increments of 1.

The vector u has its tail at (1 comma 2) and its head at (4 comma 5).

The vector v has its tail at (6 comma 4) and its head at (10 comma 3).

The vectors <math alttext="vector u"><mover><mi>u</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> and <math alttext="vector v"><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> are shown in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following could be components of <math alttext="vector u plus vector v"><mover><mi>u</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angle brackets negative 1 comma 4 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 2 comma 7 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 3 comma negative 4 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 7 comma 2 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angle brackets 7 comma 2 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
